data.title: Chengdu Superxon Communication Technology Co., Ltd.
data.meta_description: Chengdu Superxon Communication Technology Co., Ltd.
data.text:
I. Quality Strategy

1.1 Superxon quality strategy

Rigorous attitude, professional management, excellent quality

Build Superxon Brand and Create Value with Customers

1.2 Superxon quality core values

Attitude-Attitude First

Management-Management as the Outline

Quality-quality-oriented

Value-Value is the fruit

1.3 quality concept

Quality is designed

There is no limit to the quality and there must be zero defects.

Delivery without quality is drinking poison to quench thirst.

The quality of our products is our quality of life.

Heavy process, keep process, plastic process, to process quality

Quality is not only a commitment to customers but also a requirement for enterprises to themselves.

1.4 quality management methods

Standard process execution

Reasonable standards, scientific processes, and resolute implementation

Second, the environment, occupational health and safety, social responsibility

The company establishes environmental and occupational health and safety management systems respectively according to ISO14001 and OHSAS18001 standards. Based on the principle of green design, RoHS environmental protection materials are adopted to prevent and eliminate the generation of harmful substances. At the same time, pay attention to the occupational health and safety of employees, reduce occupational health and safety risks through the identification and control of risk points, and continuously
